fields.name: txtTaxpayerName
fields.title: Name - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxpayerSsn
fields.title: Social security number (SSN) - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxableIncomeLn1
fields.title: Line 1 Enter the taxable income from your 2020 Form 1040, 1040-SR, or 1040-NR, line 15  -This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtElectFarmIncome
fields.title: Line 2a   Enter your elected farm income (see instructions). Do not enter more than the amount on line 1

fields.name: txtSchjLn2B
fields.title: Line 2b   Excess, if any, of net long-term capital gain over net short-term capital loss

fields.name: txtSchjLn2C
fields.title: Line 2c   Unrecaptured section 1250 gain

fields.name: txtSubLn2FrLn1
fields.title: Line 3  Subtract line 2a from line 1 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxLn4
fields.title: Line 4   Figure the tax on the amount on line 3 using the 2020 tax rates (see instructions)

fields.name: txtTaxableIncomeLn5
fields.title: Line 5   If you used Schedule J to figure your tax for: 2019, enter the amount from your 2019 Schedule J, line 11; 2018 but not 2019, enter the amount from your 2018 Schedule J, line 15; 2017 but not 2018 or 2019, enter the amount from your 2017 Schedule J, line 3; Otherwise, enter the taxable income from your 2017 Form 1040, line 43; Form 1040A, line 27; Form 1040EZ, line 6; Form 1040-NR, line 41; or Form 1040-NR-EZ, line 14. If zero or less, see instructions

fields.name: txtDivAmtLn6
fields.title: Line 6  Divide the amount on line 2a by 3. 0 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSumAmtLn7
fields.title: Line 7 Combine lines 5 and 6. If zero or less, enter 0  - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxLn8
fields.title: Line 8   Figure the tax on the amount on line 7 using the 2017 tax rates

fields.name: txtTaxableIncomeLn9
fields.title: Line 9   If you used Schedule J to figure your tax for: 2019, enter the amount from your 2019 Schedule J, line 15. 2018 but not 2019, enter the amount from your 2018 Schedule J, line 3. Otherwise, enter the taxable income from your 2018 Form 1040, line 10; Form 1040-NR, line 41; or Form 1040-NR-EZ, line 14. If zero or less, see instructions

fields.name: txtAmtOnln6Ln10
fields.title: Line 10 Enter the amount from line 6 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSumAmtLn11
fields.title: Line 11 Combine lines 9 and 10. If less than zero, enter as a negative amount - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxLn12
fields.title: Line 12   Figure the tax on the amount on line 11 using the 2018 tax rates

fields.name: txtTaxableIncomeLn13
fields.title: Line 13   If you used Schedule J to figure your tax for 2019, enter the amount from your 2019 Schedule J, line 3. Otherwise, enter the taxable income from your 2019  Form 1040 or 1040-SR, line 11b; Form 1040-NR, line 41; or Form 1040-NR-EZ, line 14. If zero or less, see instructions

fields.name: txtAmtOnln6Ln14
fields.title: Line 14  Enter the amount from line 6 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSumAmtLn15
fields.title: Line 15  Combine lines 13 and 14. If less than zero, enter as a negative amount - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxLn16
fields.title: Line 16   Figure the tax on the amount on line 15 using the 2019 tax rates

fields.name: txtSumAmtLn17
fields.title: Line 17  Add lines 4, 8 , 12, and 16 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxpayerName
fields.title: Name - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxpayerSsn
fields.title: SSN - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtSumAmtLn17
fields.title: Line 18  Amount from line 17 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxLn18
fields.title: Line 19   If you used Schedule J to figure your tax for: 2019, enter the amount from your 2019 Schedule J, line 12. 2018 but not 2019, enter the amount from your 2018 Schedule J, line 16. 2017 but not 2018 or 2019, enter the amount from your 2017 Schedule J, line 4. Otherwise, enter the tax from your 2017 Form 1040, line 44; * Form 1040A, line 28; * Form 1040EZ, line 10; Form 1040-NR, line 42; * or Form 1040-NR-EZ, line 15

fields.name: txtTaxLn19
fields.title: Line 20    If you used Schedule J to figure your tax for: 2019, enter the amount from your 2019 Schedule J, line 16. 2018 but not 2019, enter the amount from your 2018 Schedule J, line 4. Otherwise, enter the tax from your 2018 Form 1040, line 11; * Form 1040-NR, line 42; * or Form 1040-NR-EZ, line 15

fields.name: txtTaxLn20
fields.title: Line 21   If you used Schedule J to figure your tax for 2019, enter the amount from your 2019 Schedule J, line 4. Otherwise, enter the tax from your 2019 Form 1040 or 1040-SR, line 12a; Form 1040-NR, line 42; * or Form 1040-NR-EZ, line 15. Only include tax reported on this line that is imposed by section 1 of the Internal Revenue Code (seeinstructions)

fields.name: txtSumAmtLn21
fields.title: Line 22  Add lines 19 through 21 - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtNetTaxFrSchj
fields.title: Line 23  Tax. Subtract line 22 from line 18. Also include this amount on Form 1040, 1040-SR, or 1040-NR, line 16  - This field is automatically calculated for you
